turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, could you pick up some coffee on the way back to the office?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! where would you like me to go?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm craving something from Starbucks today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That does sound good, i'm over by the one on Chandler Blvd and kyrene right now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like you to pick it up a little bit closer to the office. It's hot out i don't want my drink the melt. Could you go to the one at 4985 W. Ray Rd Chandler, AZ 85226 I'll text you the address if you need it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, I know where that one is. What would you like me to pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a vent Carmel Frapaachino

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok do you want whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please also with a carmel drizzle on top, I feel i have a sweet tooth today

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go ahead and grab you something as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! I'll head over that way right now!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, use the company card please. Also give them my account number for the points

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay the blue visa card correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes thats the one, oh i was just thinking could you have them add a double shot of expresso to my drink as well?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, that does sound good

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, also grab us a couple cake pops too (laughs)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yay! ok so thats 1 carmel frapachino, with whiped cream on top and a carmel drizzle with a double shot of expresso and 2 cakes pops?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is perfect thank you so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll be back shortly! bye now
